servicing.title: Paragliding Servicing
servicing.description: Complete servicing including canopy fabric inspection and strength testing, line strength analysis, riser state evaluation, and paraglider trimming.

trim.title: Paraglider Trimming
trim.description: Precision trimming services to optimize your wing's performance using professional tension meters and line geometry analysis.

repack.title: Parachute Repacking
repack.description: Professional emergency parachute repacking following manufacturer specifications and safety protocols.

repair.title: Glider Repair
repair.description: Comprehensive repair services for paraglider canopies and components. Currently developing advanced sewing capabilities.
